message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%. What do you say?
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
Let's split it evenly this time.  We can both get a fair share and avoid further losses from inflation.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm still not willing to give up too much control
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get at least 4000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's work together to find a solution before the inflation eats away any more of our potential gains.
